Well, a decent first half here. It's certainly not boring, but not the best match either. During the first 45 minutes, we have witnessed the ascendency of the visiting team who have been precise and effective. The home team tries to find the weakness in the opposition's defence, especially with rapid counter attacks, while the away team play possession football.
